com.asgoc.common.code

Class CodeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asgoc.common.code.CodeRepository

  • public final class CodeRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    The class used to access and manipulate the Code repository.
    Author:
    Kaartic Sivaraam

      void addCode(com.asgoc.common.code.Code code)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodeRepository

        public CodeRepository(java.lang.String basePath)
               throws com.asgoc.common.code.repositoryAccessor.InvalidRepositoryOperation
        Parameters:
        basePath - The base path of the code repository.
        Throws:
        com.asgoc.common.code.repositoryAccessor.InvalidRepositoryOperation - Thrown when the base path does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • addCode

        public void addCode(com.asgoc.common.code.Code code)
             throws com.asgoc.common.code.repositoryAccessor.InvalidRepositoryOperation
        Method used to add code and it's metadata to the specified location which should be relative to the base path of the code repository.
        Parameters:
        code - The instance of the Code class that represents the code that needs to be added to the repository.
        Throws:
        com.asgoc.common.code.repositoryAccessor.InvalidRepositoryOperation - Thrown when the invalid repository operations are performed. For more info refer documentation of RepositoryAccessor class.
